outputs.output_descr:
This Project focuses on consistent and sustainable improvement of the capacity of its target groups in regional development decision-making processes.  National counterparts at the local level will gain advanced knowledge of area-based development and practical experience in tackling vital problems, development planning and implementing initiatives. 
The Project is part of the EU funded Program "Support to Regional and Local Development in Belarus"  (AAP 2011) and contributes to the delivery of its overall goal.

project_descr: Support to Local Development in the Republic of Belarus
project_title: Support to Local Development in the Republic of Belarus
